abstract: China has just issued a new "action plan" to combat the rising spread of HIV and AIDS. This seems to be the takeaway decree: Condoms or condom vending machines should be available in 95 percent of the country's hotels by 2015. Meanwhile, heterosexual sex is surpassing injection drug use as the leading cause of infection.

headline.main: China Calls for Expanded Use of Condoms
